heading.title: training
body: With our fully equipped training room M&M Electronics are able to offer a wide range of theoretical and hands-on training courses. We also provide customer-specific training which ensures that those delegates attending our courses are trained according to the systems they work on. Please contact us should you wish to find out more about any of our proudly offered courses

courses.name: PLC Basic
courses.description: This course provides a basic introduction into the concepts behind PLC theory

courses.name: PLC Advanced
courses.description: This course provides advanced theory and practical programming on the STUDIO5000 platform

courses.name: PLC/SCADA Advanced
courses.description: This course provides advanced theory and practical programming on the STUDIO5000 and Factory Talk View HMI platform

courses.name: Drive Basic
courses.description: This course provides advanced insight into the parameters of Variable Frequency Drives
objectives: Recap of principals of AC drives
